data.title: A Snapshot of UERM
data.text:
UERM College of Medicine

The College of Medicine of the University of the East Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center was established in 1957 as the University of the East College of Medicine. In 1958, it became the first unit of the newly organized non-stock, non-profit foundation and renamed as the University of the East Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center. The foundation was named in honor of the late President Ramon Magsaysay who died in a plane crash in the same year. President Carlos P. Garcia described the founding of UERMMMC as a “great adventure, marking the advent in the Philippines of educational philanthropy”.

Introduction to UERM MED Life

The Dean of the College of Medicine requested that Batch 2008 introduce the incoming medical students to University of the East Ramon Magsaysay Memorial Medical Center (UERMMMC) by making primer videos on what the life of medical student in UERM is all about. I found these videos and would like to share it with you guys.

Notice that in the videos, the facilities and equipments are no match as compared to UST-FMS. But I don't know, are they honestly that important?? Something to think about.

Campus Life in UERM

There are various student organizations in UERM that you can join. These are helpful in the future for networking. In any event that I end up here, I have my eyes onRed Cross. These student organizations/fraternities/sororities are listed below.

Agape

Alpha Phi Omega Fraternity

Alpha Sigma Phi Fraternity

Association of International Medical Students

Beta Sigma Fraternity

Campus Ministry (CYA)

Drug Bank

Ex Orbe Medicus

Filiae Aesuclapii

Lingap para sa Kalusugan ng Sambayanan (LiKaS)

Lingkod ER

Medicine Student Council

Mu Lambda Fraternity

Mu Lambda Sorority

Phi Alpha Sigma Sorority

Pi Sigma Fraternity

Rotaract Club

Scintilla Juris

Sigma Beta Sorority

The Aesculapian (Official School Publication)

UERMMMC Red Cross Medical Volunteer Corps
